ArtifactorA.NAME: Artifactor
DESCRIPTIONS: It's a piece of cake to bake a pretty cake. This dude thinks your replicas could be better, and will make you one. What type do you want?
He does! You get a relic that makes replicas.
OPTIONS: [Bottle] #gObtain #ga #gRelic, one less energy on the first turn of combat.

ArtifactorB.NAME: Artifactor
DESCRIPTIONS: It's a piece of cake to bake a pretty cake. This dude thinks your replicas could be better, and will make you one. What type do you want?
He does! You get a relic that makes replicas.
OPTIONS: [Bottle] #gObtain #ga #gRelic, one less energy on the first turn of combat.

ArtifactorC.NAME: Artifactor
DESCRIPTIONS: A dude says he can maybe make better replicas than what you've got. Specializes in bottles.
He does! You get a relic that makes replicas.

Replicator.NAME: Replicator
DESCRIPTIONS: They'll transform 3 cards into Locked Replicas.
OPTIONS: [Transform] #gTransform #g2 #gcards into random #gReplica #gcards of the same rarity.

Relicator.NAME: Relicator
DESCRIPTIONS: Turn a replica card into a relic, at a cost.
OPTIONS: [Craft] Choose a replica, lose it, gain that relic. Gain a Pain.
